oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Is it really organic? - European scientists will spend the next 3 years searching for a unique chemical fingerprint in organic food products
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Skulskis, Virgilijus
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Education, extension and communication
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Is it really organic? - European scientists will spend the next 3 years searching for a unique chemical fingerprint in organic food products. Description of the AuthenticFood project, of which the Lithuanian Institute of Agrarian Economics is a partners. AuthenticFood is financially supported by the CORE Organic II funding bodies, being partner of the FP7 ERA-NET project: “Coordination of European Transnational Research in Organic Food and Farming Systems”.
